questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

You are provisioning Omnichannel for Customer Service.

You need to configure the system.

What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

comments.content:
Old link. This seems to confirm the answer
https://carldesouza.com/how-to-install-microsoft-omnichannel-for-customer-service/
Deprecated now. Hopefully wont appear in exam

questions.question_text:
You are implementing Omnichannel for Customer Service.

The customer service supervisor wants to change one of the intraday KPI calculation methods.

You need to modify the supervisor dashboard with the new KPI.

Which tool should you use?

discussion.content:
Top Sentiment pulse - No match found - assume this is Conversation & channel

Bot Resolution Time - Bot Insights (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dynamics365/customer-service/implement/omnichannel-insights-dashboard#botinsights)

Average Customer Sentiment Pulse - Conversation & Channel (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dynamics365/customer-service/implement/omnichannel-insights-dashboard#conversations-and-channels)

Transfer Rate - Conversation & Channel (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dynamics365/customer-service/implement/omnichannel-insights-dashboard#conversations-and-channels)

I think the first and last items are incorrect.
The other ones seem to be correct.

Top Sentiment Pulse - Conversations and Channels Section 
Bot Resolution Time - Bot Insights Section
Average Customer Sentiment Pulse - Conversations and Channels Section
Transfer Rate - Agent Section

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/getting-started-omnichannel/omnichannel-insights-dashboard

The answer is correct.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/omnichannel-insights-dashboard#conversations-and-channels

The link shows you a screenshot of the Conversations screen and the Channels screen, and you can see each of those metrics associated with the two screenshots respectively.

Answer should be A, C, B, B

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/omnichannel-insights-dashboard
Transfer rate can also be found in the Agent section.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
You are an Omnichannel supervisor for a company.
The company wants to deploy an Omnichannel Insights dashboard.
You need to set up and monitor KPIs.
In which section is each KPI located? To answer, drag the appropriate sections to the correct KPIs. Each section may be used once, more than once, of not at all.
You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

You are creating a bot by using Power Virtual Agents to work within Dynamics 365 Customer Service.

The bot must support voice and chat capabilities. The bot must also meet the following requirements:

• When a user starts the conversation, the bot should ask if they need help with installation or support.
• The user must be able to talk to a live person when requested.

You need to configure the bot.

What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: IMO, it should be 4,1,2 since live representative needs to receive the case.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

You are using Omnichannel for Customer Service.

You need to configure Power Virtual Agents to route calls to a live representative when cases come into Dynamics 365 Customer Service.

Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.

//IMG//
